name: Elemental Vortex
description: A chaotic portal connects to the Elemental Chaos, providing access to the realm of pure elemental energy. The elemental connection provides opportunities for elemental magic and crafting research, while the chaotic nature and potential elemental threats create constant danger.
atmosphere: Fire crackles, water hisses, earth rumbles, and wind howls in chaotic symphony around a swirling vortex. Raw elemental energy creates auroras of impossible colors that dance and merge. Crystalline formations of pure elemental essence float suspended in the air. Ozone and molten stone scents mingle with the raw power of creation.
